Dishes.name: Hot and sour chicken soup
Dishes.shortDescription: Hot and sour soup is a soup from Asian culinary traditions. In all cases, the soup contains ingredients to make it both spicy and sour.

Dishes.name: Margherita pizza
Dishes.shortDescription: A classic delight with 100% Real mozzarella cheese
Dishes.ingredientsAndWarinng: Crust: rice flour, water, corn starch, tapioca dextrin, non-fatty dry milk, whole eggs, sugar, salt, xanthan gum, baking powder, soybean oil, yeast. Topping: tomato sauce (chopped tomatoes, crushed tomatoes, onions, garlic, canola oil, tomato paste, butter, parsley, basil, sugar, salt)
